roleset.name: fashion again
roleset.note: REFASHION-V NOTES: Frames file for 'refashion' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from refashion.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: Mrs. Thatcher, who was practicing the read-my-lips school of politics years before Mr. Bush encountered it, has made clear her opposition to *trace* refashioning Britain's free-market policies to suit the bureaucrats in Brussels.
example.arg: to suit the bureaucrats in Brussels
